entry.title: Capybara::ElementNotFound: Unable to Find File Field “file”
entry.content:
Html code:

```html

Upload File

```

Rspec code:

ruby attach_file('resumefile', file_path)

And when we exec the spec, there will be an error, ‘Capybara::ElementNotFound: Unable to find file field “file”’, so we should do this:

ruby Capybara.ignore_hidden_elements = false

Add above code into spec_helper.rb file.

entry.title: Bundle Install or Exec Another Project in This Project
entry.content:
rspec.rake

```ruby repo_path = ‘another project absolute path’

Bundler.with_clean_env do Dir.chdir repo_path do %x{bundle install} end end

…

Bundler.with_clean_env do Dir.chdir repo_path do %x{rspec spec –format html –out rspec_results.html –format documentation –out rspec_results.txt} end end ```
